entry.title: off-topic: bitcoin-forum...
entry.summary: As a user, the individual is trying to share their thoughts on bitcoin forums, specifically bitcointalk.org. However, they express a desire for a more streamlined platform, such as a mailing list, as they find the forums to be cluttered with avatars, smilies, and signature blocks. Additionally, they note that when content disappears from forums, it is lost forever instead of being preserved in archives. The user also mentions that the existing bitcoin-user mailing list on sourceforge is no longer active.
